{3}, Discard Ancient Ossuary: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever you cast an Inscription spell, you may choose target creature you control. If you do, as that Inscription resolves, exile it inscribed onto that creature instead of putting it anywhere else.

You may put a permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your hand onto the battlefield.
Inscribe {3}{G} ({3}{G}: Exile this card from your hand inscribed on a creature you control. Whenever that creature attacks, its controller may cast a copy of the inscribed card without paying its mana cost. Inscribe only as a sorcery.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a loyalty counter on each planeswalker you control.
[0]: Tap target creature.
[-1]: Untap target basic land.
[-7]: Draw up to six cards.

Menace
When Azuma Hashiro, the Thronebreaker enters, you may cast up to two cards from your opponents' graveyards without paying their mana costs. If those spells would be put into a graveyard, exile that card instead.

Until end of turn, cards in graveyards lose all names, card types, and abilities.
Draw a card.

Poisonous 1 (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
Blade of the Serpent gets +1/+1 as long as an opponent is poisoned.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on Chalkira Duelist.

{T}: Add {C}.
{1}: Clutch of the Coil becomes a 1/1 Snake creature with poisonous 2 until end of turn. It's still a land. (Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets two poison counters. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
Target opponent chooses a card type, then reveals their hand. You choose a card from it that's not of the chosen type. That player discards that card.
{3}, {T}: Choose a card name, then reveal a card at random from your hand. If that card has the chosen name, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to any target.

Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Scry 2.

Deathtouch
Art of war — At the beginning of your end step, if Disciple of Hashiro dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Destroy target creature.

Dragon's Ire deals 1 damage to any target.
Inscribed creature gets +2/+2.
Inscribe {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Exile this card from your hand inscribed on a creature you control. Whenever that creature attacks, its controller may cast a copy of the inscribed card without paying its mana cost. Inscribe only as a sorcery.)

Trample
Art of war — At the beginning of your end step, if Dragon's Wake dealt damage to an opponent this turn, gain control of target land for as long as Dragon's Wake remains on the battlefield.
Tap three untapped creatures you control: Dragon's Wake becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

Defender
A deck can have any number of cards named Dragonwall Fragment.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more creatures named Dragonwall Fragment, you win the game.

Flash
When Dragonwall Samurai enters, prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn.
Put target attacking or blocking creature on the bottom of its owner's library.
When Elemental Loremaster enters, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
Legendary creatures you control get +1/+1.

Vigilance
Art of war — At the beginning of your end step, if Emperor Kenshiro dealt damage to an opponent this turn, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

Empress Kogane can't attack or block.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may gain life equal to that spell's mana value.

Snakes you control get +1/+1 and have poisonous 1. (Multiple instances of poisonous trigger separately.)
At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.

Destroy target enchantment and all other enchantments with the same name as that enchantment.
Draw a card.

Destroy target artifact and all other artifacts with the same name as that artifact.
Draw a card.

Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.
Draw a card.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Exile target creature.

When Fireheart Channeler dies, you may put a blaze counter on target land without a blaze counter on it. As long as that land has a blaze counter on it, it has “At the beginning of your upkeep, this land deals 1 damage to you.” (The land continues to burn after Fireheart Channeler has left the battlefield.)

For each Equipment you control, you may attach it to target creature you control.
Draw a card.
Untap target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn.
When Giku Weaponsmith enters, create two colorless Equipment artifact tokens with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and equip {1}.
Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 4 life for each creature tapped this way.

Menace
Art of war — At the beginning of your end step, if Hashiro's Infiltrator dealt damage to an opponent this turn, that player discards a card.

{T}: Add {C}.
When Heavenly Temple enters, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{2}: Return Heavenly Temple from the battlefield to its owner's hand.

Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Hinasa Mystic enters, draw a card.

Target creature you control fights another target creature.

When Ichi-no-Oni enters, each player loses 2 life.

cards.rules_text:
First strike
Art of war — At the beginning of your end step, if Imperial Kensai dealt damage to an opponent this turn, you may pay 1 life. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Imperial Kensai.

Trample

Imperial Marketplace enters with a charge counter on it.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Imperial Marketplace: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Enchant land you don't control
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, you may draw a card.

Draw a card.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each spell you cast this turn.

Nonbasic landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.)
Art of war — At the beginning of your end step, if Kenshiro's Cavalry dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

When Kiyomi's Disciple enters, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When Kiyomi's Disciple is no longer on the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.

Double strike
Art of war — At the beginning of your end step, if Kogane's Swordmaster dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Art of war — At the beginning of your end step, if Kowareta Scrounger dealt damage to an opponent this turn, you may search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Art of war — At the beginning of your end step, if Kurayami Ronin dealt damage to an opponent this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Menace
Whenever a nontoken creature you don't control dies, create a token that's a copy of that creature except it's a colorless Spirit. Exile it at the beginning of your next end step.
Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

Haste

{T}: Cast a copy of an inscribed card without paying its mana cost.

Prowess
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, noncreature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast until end of turn.

Masked Impersonator can't be blocked.

Flash

Exile target nontoken permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Each instant and sorcery card you own that isn't on the battlefield has inscribe. The inscribe cost is equal to its mana cost. (Exile that spell card inscribed on a creature you control. Whenever that creature attacks, its controller may cast a copy of the inscribed card without paying its mana cost. Inscribe only as a sorcery.)

Trample

Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.

Noncreature spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.

Flash
